Sentencas: This study proposes a novel interconnector, termed beam and slot interconnector (BSI), for the anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: A detailed comparative investigation is conducted on various transport characteristics and electrical performance of the SOFC stacks with conventional straight channel interconnectors (SCIs) or with novel interconnectors.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: Results show that the peak power density of a SOFC stack with BSIs is 24.8% higher than it with SCIs at 700 degrees C and a fuel-air flow rate of 16-40 Nml/(min.cm(2)).
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: Moreover, BSI can reduce the fuel-air feeding and enhance the fuel-air utilization while maintaining high output power density.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: Compared with SCI, BSI promotes the gas disturbance, significantly increases the gas velocity and vorticity, and leads the gas to flow in the direction perpendicular to the channel.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: BSI eliminates the limitation of SCIs on gas diffusion in the electrode and transfers sufficient reactant gas into the electrode function layers for electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: BSI shortens the charge transfer path in SOFC and almost avoids the adverse effects of the electrode-interconnector contact resistance.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: Compared with the conventional SOFC stack, the novel SOFC stack with BSIs significantly reduces various overpotentials.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack
Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: C and 0.5 A/cm(2), the activation, concentration, and contact overpotentials are reduced by 8.5%, 47.4%, and 96.4% respectively, and the total overpotential finally drops by 20.0%.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack

Sentencas: Overall, the electrical performance of the SOFC stack with novel interconnectors significantly exceeds the one with conventional interconnectors under the same operating conditions.
Titulo: Performance enhancement of a beam and slot interconnector for anode-supported SOFC stack
